alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Comal; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Hays; Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Caldwell, southern Hays, Guadalupe, south central Travis, northwestern Gonzales and Comal Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Lockhart to Selma. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Braunfels, San Marcos, Schertz, Kyle, Seguin, Cibolo, Buda, Lockhart, Selma, Luling, Wimberley, Canyon Lake Dam, Canyon Lake, Bulverde, Garden Ridge, McQueeney, Martindale, Marion, Uhland and Mustang Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Comal; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Hays; Travis
